contentfulBlogPost.title: First Round of Speakers for 2020 Summit Announced

body.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Hello Open Hardware Community,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Thank you for the overwhelming response with your submissions again this year.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We have announced the first round of confirmed speakers for Open Hardware Summit 2020. We are excited to have them speak on various topics from 3d printing to space, chip-level design, and robots.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"This being the 10th annual summit, the speakers will also cover learnings from the past decade and what to expect in the next decade of the open hardware revolution. Check out the list here- ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://2020.oshwa.org/speakers/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"https://2020.oshwa.org/speakers/","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We will announce the next set of speakers and schedule soon.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Looking forward to seeing you at the Summit on the 13th of March 2020.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pageContext.title: First Round of Speakers for 2020 Summit Announced
